name: Pong MMO
description:
This is a game i made to test the Photon Engine for Unity.

It's a quite uncomplete generic Pong game.

The multiplayer is, at this date 11/21/2020, functional but i don't know how much inactivity time the Photon servers can handle.

You can create and enter rooms(the game acepts 3 rooms in this stage for lack of interface implementation but it could acept a total of 10 rooms for 2 players, as 20 conections is the limit of the free Photon service)

There's also no victory condition and some pendnecies in screen flux like quiting a room.

There are no conection error handling as well.

All of those features could be implemented in the future but i don't think there's use in continuing with this project by this time.
